hotels.title: Brussels Urban Garden Retreat with Farm-to-Table Restaurant
hotels.description: A stone's throw from the leafy oasis of Brussels Botanical Gardens is the arty and cutting-edge Hotel Indigo Brussels - City, an IHG Hotel. Spend your days in style at SERRA, an eco-conscious restaurant with an emphasis on organic, farm-to-plate dining. This all-day, slow-dining venue is resplendent with hanging plants, velvet and leather upholstery and floral-themed wallpaper - it's a feast for all senses. Meanwhile, the Urban Fitness centre features a fully equipped gym and a steamy sauna.

hotels.title: Brussels City Break near Airport with Onsite Restaurant & Bar
hotels.description: Immerse yourself in the glory and beauty of the Grand Place, and feel yourself getting lost in the intricate details of the city with a getaway to Crowne Plaza Brussels Airport, an IHG Hotel. Positioned minutes from the airport and train station, spend your days devouring traditional Belgian waffles and double-fried frites or admiring the playful art that decorates the cityâ€™s streets. Unwind with a delectable, effervescent Belgian beer or wholesome plate at Craft restaurant.
